name: Multipath Utility Long Sleeve Shirt - Men's

features: Slim fit sits close to the body, with room for the garment to move with you
Dryride Mist-Defy DWR fabric repels water while staying soft and comfortable
Made of nylon and spandex woven fabric
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
Underarm eyelet vents provide additional breathability
Snap-closure chest pocket, stash pocket, and zippered chest pocket
